trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control in a visual designer.
For more information about this class, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner"></xref> class.

The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
Returns the HTML markup that is used to display the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control, and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
The control designer regions for the associated control.
The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.
Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
The region to update.
A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control at design time.
Initializes the specified component.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> component that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
Specifies the content for the editable region of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control at design time.
The region to update.
A serialized template for the associated control.
Called when the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control changes.
The source of the event.
The event data.

Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control to generate the design-time markup, instead of using the actual control that is associated with the designer.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
